Truth Set

DM
Jun 5, 2021

Given a Predicates $P$ and a Domain of Discourse $D$ we define a truth set of $P$ which contains elements from set $D$ for which $P(x)$ is true.

Subsets

DM
Jun 5, 2021

Set $A$ is subset of set $B$ if and only if every element of set $A$ is present in set $B$.

Set Union

DM
Jun 5, 2021

Union of two Sets $A$ and $B$ is the set that contains elements from both sets.

Set Intersection

DM
Jun 5, 2021

Intersection of two Sets $A$ and $B$ is the set that contains elements common in both sets.
